p: qRT-PCR analysis using Taqman probes confirmed that CD exposure led to a significant upregulation of Slc27a3 messenger ribonucleic acid (mRNA) (p = 0.003) in VAT ( Figure 1(b)), however, in contrast to the PCR array findings, no significant differences in Slc27a3 expression was observed in SAT from CD-fed compared STD-fed rats (p = 0.236) ( Figure 1(c)).
